name: The Climb of ZO
description:
The Climb of ZO, who is a sentient D20 dice, is a platformer in which the gameplay is based entirely on RNG and where the main character jumps and rolls as spikes follow him into the high skies. The platforms on which the player jumps are randomly generated only just before the player reaches them, thus placing him in pressuring situations which require quick thinking and reactions. The purpose of the game is to help ZO stay alive for as long as possible and therefore achieve the highest score you can, while at the mercy of RNG.

Controls

A/D or arrows to move horizontally

Space to jump

Esc to pause
